title: User Details
description: Schema for the response of the /userdetails/:userid endpoint. It provides a list of required fields associated with a user.

address.description: Physical mailing address of the user. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

affiliate_reference.description: Affiliate reference or identifier for tracking purposes. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

birth_date.description: User's birth date in YYYY-MM-DD format. This field is required.

city.description: City of the user's address. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

country.description: Country of the user's residence. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

currency.description: Preferred currency for the user's transactions.

email.description: Email address of the user. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

first_name.description: User's first name. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

is_blocked.description: Indicates whether the user's account is blocked. This field is required.

is_excluded.description: Flag to indicate if the user is excluded. This field is required.

language.description: Preferred language of the user. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

last_name.description: User's last name. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

market.description: Market or region the user is associated with. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

mobile.description: User's mobile phone number without country prefix. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

mobile_prefix.description: Country prefix for the user's mobile phone number. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

origin.description: Origin of the user's account or referral source, typically the brand name. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

postal_code.description: Postal code for the user's address. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

registration_code.description: Registration code used during the user's account creation. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

registration_date.description: Date and time of the user's account registration in RFC3339 format. This field is required.

roles.description: List of roles or permissions assigned to the user. This field can be left as an empty array but is required.

sex.description: User's sex as specified in their profile. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

title.description: Title or honorific of the user. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

user_id.description: Unique identifier for the user, can be an integer or GUID. This field is required.

username.description: User's chosen username. This field can be left as an empty string but is required.

verified_at.description: Timestamp of when the user's account was verified, optional. In RFC3339 format.

segmentation.description: Optional segmentation information for the user. Additional custom segmentation fields may be included.

custom_segment.description: Custom segment value for targeted marketing or analytics.
